quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal. It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock. Do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you. Failure builds character.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: I've missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.text: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.text: You miss 100 percent of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see it.
quotes.author: Confucius
